I'm scared to death! Waiting is driving me crazy. But my question is what do y'all think b9 cyst or what? Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2016 11:27AM - edited Jan 31, 2016 11:28AM by Cowgirl143 Wishing u all the luck charlotteapple!! I'm ready to go and get it all over with I'm ok during the day some what but at night I can't sleep I constantly think about it non stop scary stuff. I have 4 girls my step daughter is almost 14 and my oldest is 12 and my twins r almost 11 and I can't help but think what if and cry bc I'm so scared it will b cancer and that I want b able 2 watch them finish growing up!! Ughhh so ready for answers. I know I should b thankful that my appointment was given to me quickly but to me not fast enough. Thanks for reading and sending comforting words . I will update after my appointment and I hope u will too!!

Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2016 11:37AM Cowgirl143 wrote: Sorry haven't wrote sooner hubby took me to Tennessee for a while trying to keep my mind off waiting for result well let me back up I had the mammogram and the ultrasound so the lady does my ultrasound measures the mass that we can all clearly feel then she is moving around taking pics and then she measures another spot in my breast and another! Well she goes I'll b back when then the radiologist sees these well she comes back in twice says he's in a procedure and final comes in and says we think it's just a cyst and sends me home. I get home from Tennessee and the mammogram paper is in well a card it says everything is normal that's it no need to see me again. Well today I get a phone call from the cancer center saying they need to schedule me for a consult. My heart dropped the lady could tell me nothing other than that. Well I call the health department bc that's where my results went she said that bc I had an abnormal mass that I have to go have a second opinion and so please go to make sure. OK can anyone tell me what this means I'm freaking out and really didn't even know what to ask I was just like I was in lala land.
Posts.Title: Hard but kinda movable mass\ stressing Cowgirl143 Cowgirl143

Posts.Content: Feb 19, 2016 09:15AM Cowgirl143 wrote: Well ladies here I am with another worry. Guess I just need someone to tell so I can get it off my mind. For the last couple of weeks my underarm has been sore not painful just sore and full it almost feels like I stuck something under my arm to carry or something. We'll today I checked to see if I felt anything and there it was a lump not small enough to say I'm just being paranoid. I know I don't have to much longer b4 i go to the breast cancer center and get the answers. I just needed to get it off my chest. Don't want to worry hubby anymore than he already is. And we'll my sister pretty avoids the conversation she is my little sis but always try to big the big sis we r extremely close and I think it scares her to let her mind go there . We'll thanks for listening and god bless!
